data.name: Currency
desc: Symbols, names, and attributes of a specific currency, returned in a sequence by XLocaleData.getAllCurrencies().

properties.name: ID
desc: ISO 4217 currency code identifier, for example, EUR or USD.

properties.name: BankSymbol
desc: Currency abbreviation used by banks and in money exchange, for example, EUR or USD.
This usually should be identical to the ISO 4217 currency code also used in the ID, but doesn't necessarily have to be.

properties.name: Name
desc: Name of the currency, for example, Euro or US Dollar.

properties.name: Default
desc: If this currency is the default currency for a given locale.

properties.name: UsedInCompatibleFormatCodes
desc: If this currency is the one used in compatible number format codes with FormatElement.formatIndex() values in the range 12..17.
Those format codes are used to generate some old style currency format codes for compatibility with StarOffice5 and StarOffice4.

properties.name: DecimalPlaces
desc: The number of decimal places, for example, 2 for US Dollar or 0 for Italian Lira.
